data.title: Lear Investment Management wins Zephyr/PSN "Manager of the Decade" award, showcasing exceptional performance.
data.description: In Dallas on February 27, 2026, Lear Investment Management, known for its strategic approach and flexibility, has been honored with the prestigious title of Zephyr/PSN Manager of the Decade. This award acknowledges the firm's exceptional performance in the financial market, particularly in its Global Vigilance Conservative strategy.

data.title: McLean & Company announces Shawn Kanungo as keynote for Signature 2026 HR Conference in Las Vegas on October 4-6, 2026.
data.description: Renowned innovation strategist and bestselling author Shawn Kanungo has been selected as the keynote speaker for Signature 2026, the premier HR conference organized by McLean & Company. The event is scheduled to be held from October 4 to 6, 2026, at the Virgin Hotels Las Vegas. Kanungo, a globally recognized figure, is known for his dynamic presentations and expertise in the field of innovation. This significant announcement highlights the prestigious lineup of speakers and events planned for the conference, which is expected to draw a large audience of professionals and industry experts.

data.title: Intact Technology named 2026 ServiceNow U.S. Federal Partner of the Year and Worldwide AI Customer Value Partner of the Year.
data.description: Intact Technology, a renowned ServiceNow Partner specializing in Federal and highly regulated enterprise settings, has been honored with two prestigious awards in the 2026 ServiceNow Partner Awards. The company has been named the U.S. Federal Government Partner of the Year for the Americas and the AI Customer Value Partner of the World. This recognition highlights Intact's expertise in managing intricate ServiceNow projects within the Federal Government, showcasing its commitment to excellence in this field.

data.title: ValGenesis to exhibit at BioProcessing Summit Europe 2026 in Barcelona, featuring Global Leader in digital validation lifecycle management.
data.description: ValGenesis Inc., a top digital validation lifecycle management firm, is set to present its Process Lifecycle Suite at the BioProcessing Summit Europe 2026 in Barcelona from March 10-12. This event is a key gathering for bioprocessing leaders, scientists, and industry influencers driving modern biomanufacturing. Noteworthy attendees include numerous pharmaceutical and biotechnology firms, as well as those focusing on cell and gene therapy development. data.title: ERLY Skincare reaches milestone of one year, fueled by loyal customers and grassroots support in Austin.
data.description: ERLY Skincare, an acclaimed brand headquartered in Austin, has reached a significant milestone year due to its loyal customer base, strong grassroots support, and the introduction of innovative initiatives. As of February 27, 2026, the company commemorates its one-year anniversary, demonstrating a year's worth of revolutionary progress in redefining skincare standards.

data.title: BioArctic AB issued 78,000 Class B shares on Feb 27, 2026; total number of shares and votes.
data.description: Today, BioArctic AB (publ) (Nasdaq Stockholm: BIOA B) revealed that they had distributed 78,000 Class B shares in February as part of the 2019/2028 stock option program approved at the Annual General Meeting in May.

data.title: MARA stock rises 10% after $1.7B loss from Bitcoin writedowns; pivoting to AI infrastructure partnership. Q4 revenue down 6%.
data.description: MARA Holdings (NASDAQ: MARA) saw a remarkable 10% surge following the announcement of a partnership with Starwood Digital Ventures to convert mining sites for AI infrastructure. This surge comes in the wake of a Q4 loss of $1.7 billion due to Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) writedowns. The $1.7 billion net loss for Q4 represents a significant drop from the $528.3 million net income reported a year earlier. A substantial decrease in the fair value of Bitcoin holdings by $1.5 billion negated any operating gains, coinciding with BTC's price drop from $114,068 at the end of Q3 to $87,498 by December 31. Revenue also took a hit in Q4, falling by 6% to $202.3 million from $214.4 million in Q4 2024, propelled by a 14% decline in the average price of Bitcoin mined during that period. Despite this, the full-year revenue experienced a notable 38% growth to $907.1 million. However, this positive full-year growth was overshadowed by the massive quarterly writedown. MARA currently holds 53,822 BTC with an estimated value of approximately $4.7 billion.
